title: Lord El-Melloi II-sei no Jikenbo
original_name: ロード・エルメロイ Ⅱ 世の事件簿
sinopse: When Lord El-Melloi II, the later Waver Velvet, gets asked to claim his inheritance over Adra Castle, he travels there with his apprentice Gray to do so. But they are not the only ones called that way. The will of the previous owner states that the assembled contestants—including Luviagelita Edelfelt—must compete in a game of wits to win the castle.
